name: mm::frame::meta::MetaSlot::write_meta

core::ptr::metadata.doc:
Extracts the metadata component of a pointer.

 Values of type `*mut T`, `&T`, or `&mut T` can be passed directly to this function
 as they implicitly coerce to `*const T`.

 # Example

 ```
 #![feature(ptr_metadata)]

 assert_eq!(std::ptr::metadata("foo"), 3_usize);
 ```

doc:
Writes the metadata to the slot without reading or dropping the previous value.

 # Safety

 The caller should have exclusive access to the metadata slot's fields.
